mean_en: the practice of keeping yourself and your surroundings clean
word_etyma: cleanl清洁地 + i + ness名词后缀 → cleanliness 清洁
short_phrase: You can promote cleanliness by washing your hands.
sentence: Cleanliness is very important when trying to stop diseases from spreading.
sentence_trans: 清洁的重要性在于能阻止疾病的传播。
